nodes.text: The Crystal Flats was a large expanse of volcanic rock on Mustafar. The northern portion of the area was covered with crystals formed from mineral deposits in the lava, giving the entire region its name.

The Crystal Flats were known to be the home to a particularly aggressive subspecies of Mustafar lava flea. The area was also a location in which members of the Blackguard collected crystals for their lightsabers.

The Crystal Flats appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
